sentence: Let's show them we're NOT backing down: https://t.co/4OXYM6kWP5 pic.twitter.com/o6xQ538lJz Mandela Barnes (@TheOtherMandela) December 20, 2021
title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: Another of the Democrats seeking to challenge the senator in 2022, Wisconsin Lieutenant Governor Mandela Barnes, summed things up succinctly when he observed, Ron Johnson used his office to enrich some of his wealthiest campaign donors while raising taxes on the middle class and widening the income inequality gap.? The senator's machinations had nothing to do with Wisconsin.
author: John Nichols
title: Ron Johnson Breaks His Term-Limit Pledge in Order to Keep Serving the Billionaire Class

sentence: This cycle, several candidates of color are running in Senate and House races in both parties, including Democratic Senate contenders Charles Booker in Kentucky and Mandela Barnes in Wisconsin, and GOP House candidates Wesley Hunt in Texas and John James in Michigan.
author: Kate Ackley
title: Black, Latino candidates dominate fourth quarters top fundraisers
